ygData.subject: Re: Rangers and warriors
ygData.msgSnippet: Brian, I saw a unique way to do that in another game. They added a ring for high level players only. When you got to a spot you liked you turned the ring.
ygData.messageBody:
Brian,
I saw a unique way to do that in another game. They added a ring for high level
players only. When you got to a spot you liked you "turned" the ring. After that
you could go anywhere ... then again "turn" the ring and .... poof, you were
back at your bound ring spot. It was SUCH a cool item.

Unfortunately, I think the Verant guys want to keep people separated for some
reason in this game (zone server reasons maybe??) There does need to be a way
to stay somewhere though ... maybe they could balance it with a high cost or
something.

-Faderic


"Jones, Brian" wrote:

> From: "Jones, Brian" <brian.jones@...>
>
> Um, which part did you think was funny? The ultimate weapon
> or the boots? :) I really, seriously would like a magic item for
> warriors to be able to gate back to their bound spot. Or at least
> give a spell to a wizard that allows you to gate them back (they
> are still not able to bind you anywhere but a city).
>
